description.displayText: On the one hand, I very selfishly don't want Judy to get too busy, but on the other hand, how can I not rave about her? She's full of positive energy, love and compassion for people and especially little ones...and we absolutely love working with her!
description.originalText: On the one hand, I very selfishly don't want Judy to get too busy, but on the other hand, how can I not rave about her? She's full of positive energy, love and compassion for people and especially little ones...and we absolutely love working with her!

description.displayText: I hired Judy to help me at night for a week with my 1 year old twins. I had been having sleep issues with one of my twins and needed to have an extra set of hands at night to keep me on track and not lose my mind in the land of sleep deprivation. In addition to the sleeping issue that week was a deadline week for me at work so I needed to have someone in place to help with the kids if they woke up while I was trying to meet my deadline (in case I needed to work through the night). We spoke at length about the routine, my kids sleep habits, etc. I had discussed with her that I was going to restart my sleep lady shuffle training a few days prior to her coming over in hopes to get back on track so the week would be week two of sleep training and hopefully smooth sailing. I was successful and Judy came in without meeting me or my kids prior and was absolutely super! She is calm, reassuring and a pleasure to have around. We worked really well together and I will be calling her in the future (hopefully she will be available). The last night we had scheduled for her to come my son actually got sick around the time she was supposed to arrive and while taking care of him I lost track of time and didn't hear the doorbell ringing. I felt horrible as Judy waited for a while and then decided to head home. She was unbelievably understanding and concerned about what had happened. She understands that with kids the unexpected happens and she rolled with the punches! She is stellar!

description.displayText: We hired Judy at the last minute to help manage kids at a wedding.  Wow.  She completely accommodated our ever-changing schedule, showed up when she said she would, was great with the kids and remained warm, professional and caring throughout the entire process.  She saved the night!
description.originalText: We hired Judy at the last minute to help manage kids at a wedding.  Wow. She saved the night!

description.displayText: We hired Judy to watch our (very fussy) 3 month old last month and she was great!  She was very calm and patient with her and sent us a lot of updates while we were out.   We will hire Judy again - she is already booked for next weekend!
description.originalText: We hired Judy to watch our (very fussy) 3 month old last month and she was great!  She was very calm and patient with her and sent us a lot of updates while we were out.   We will hire Judy again - she is already booked for next weekend!

description.displayText: We decided to spend one in the city but in order to enjoy it I need it to look for someone to take care of my son. I came across Judy's profile and I was very impressed. I leave her a voice mail and with in seconds she call me back, she sounded very professional and loving. We agreed with a date and time and she send a text message to follow up. The day we meet her she was amazing with my son, they start playing right away and he felt very comfortable with her. When we were leaving she asked us if we wanted to receive text messages every hour letting us know how everything was... =) She was just so great. I wish we live in the city so we could call her every weekend. I will recommend her to anyone that has a child!

description.displayText: We needed a substitute sitter for a day. When Judy came over to interview we were immediately impressed. She was very professional with a full resume prepared. Our son took an instant liking to her. Closer to the date of her own suggestion she arranged to spend the morning with our usual nanny to see the "routine", was in communication with us about the details of his schedule via email leading up to the date, and she even scoped out our son's class location ahead of time so the day with him would be seamless. During the course of the day with our child she sent us updates via email/text and she gracious accepted my 2 phone check ins. She easily achieved our ambitious agenda for the day. Our son clearly had a wonderful day with her. We are looking forward to having Judy with us again in the future. Responses well to email/text for busy parents even in scheduling phase as well.

description.displayText:
While visiting NYC we had an unplanned short-term need for a sitter which is frightening to us as we don't like to leave our kids (7, 10) with "strangers". We ended up hiring Judy and I could not have been happier with our decision.

She was the fastest and most consistent to reply, our main reason to hire her. She was punctual, nice, courteous and professional. While we were gone she updated us every 20/30 minutes on current status which helped greatly to calm us down allowing us to make the most of the evening. The kids loved her, too. The originally scary proposition of hiring a stranger turned into a big success. We highly recommend her. Thanks, Judy.

description.displayText: Judy looks after our daughter during the week, and she is an absolute gem. After my daughter's birth, I was nervous about returning to work and was anxious to find someone loving, competent, knowledgeable, and professional to provide childcare for us. Judy is all this and more. Her skill, attention to detail, courteousness, and patience are without equal. My daughter is so happy when Judy walks through the door and can't wait to start playing and exploring with her. I cannot say enough about how blessed we feel to share our family with her. I can confidently and enthusiastically recommend her without reservation. She will be a gift to both your child(ren) and to you.

description.displayText: It is with great pleasure that I recommend Judy.  We were visiting New York for a little over a week and we needed a sitter to watch our 4 year old at night.  Judy was prompt in answering all emails and was very thorough in letting me know when she was available.  She was on time and delightful from the beginning.  Judy quickly developed a great rapport with our daughter and we were thrilled.  The second time she came over, she brought coloring pages that made my daughter so happy.  By the last time she came over, my daughter was looking forward to seeing her and hanging out with her.  Judy is a wonderful caregiver and when we come back to NYC we will definitely call on her again.

description.displayText: Judy worked with us providing care for our infant daughter. She is very good with young children, playing and providing good care while being flexible in response to changing needs and schedules.  It is with confidence that I can recommend her for a childcare position.
